content.rendered:
David Chiles

Technical Recruiter

Bachelor’s Degree from the University of Central Florida

 

BRIEF DESCRIPTION OF WHAT YOU DO FOR ATR.

Focused on finding qualified in Engineering and Technical roles.

 

WHAT DO YOU HOPE TO ACHIEVE IN YOUR POSITION?

Making a positive impact on the careers of candidates and improving productivity for our clients.

 

ADVICE FOR CANDIDATES:

You are more than just a resume. The best recruiters seriously consider personality when hiring, so let yours shine. In part, this means relaxing during your interview, showing enthusiasm and talking about your ideas, successes, and goals. It also means providing links to your portfolios and social media profiles. Be upfront with all the information recruitment teams are looking for.

 

WHAT ADVICE DO YOU HAVE FOR HIRING MANAGERS?

People are not your most important asset, the right people are.

 

WHAT ARE YOUR HOBBIES AND INTERESTS OUTSIDE OF WORK?

Big Sports fan, mostly Tampa based teams.

 

WHAT’S YOUR FAVORITE PLACE?

The Lake.

 

What’s your favorite quote?

-“The harder you work, the luckier you get.”
